message.content:
It is difficult to provide an accurate summary of what "most" women in Dominica think of abortion as opinions on such a complex and personal matter can vary widely. However, it is important to note that Dominica is a predominantly Catholic island nation, and Catholic teachings generally oppose abortion. 

Therefore, it can be inferred that many women in Dominica may hold traditional beliefs influenced by their religious and cultural background, which may lead them to view abortion as morally wrong. However, this does not mean that all women in Dominica share this perspective, as individual opinions can differ based on personal experience, education, and various other factors. It is essential to explore the opinions of women in Dominica through research or surveys to gain a better understanding of their views on abortion.
